txt.en: The provision stores are in Stoke, outside the inn.\n\nYou should bring the provisions you gathered to the provision stockpile.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. You have proven a friend to the common folk of Stoke and Torsbury.'
Deliver provisions to the provision stockpile
War is afoot, and the town of Stoke is preparing for the inevitable siege.
Baldmund is at the inn in Stoke.\n\nYou should return to Baldmund and let him know that you have done as he requested.
Wolves can be found to the south and east of Stoke.\n\nBaldmund has asked you to cull the wolves terrorizing his hunters.

Meat and ivory can be collected from the aurochs to the south and west and the deer to the north, south, and east. Hides can be collected from wolves, deer, and aurochs.\n\nBaldmund has asked you to help provision the town for the coming siege.

'While you are here, I could use your help. My people and the townsfolk of Stoke have both asked me to speak for them and make sure their needs are not being overlooked. I do not doubt Reeve Fr√≠thild's concern, but there seems to be plenty of battle preparations and little provisioning. I would take some hunters out myself, but there are too many wolves roaming the fields.\n\n'Would you cull the wolves' numbers and hunt up some provisions for us? We need meat, hides, and ivory. The meat and ivory can be gathered from the deer to the north, east, and south and from the aurochs to the south and the hides from the wolves, deer, and aurochs.'
